:navigation-title: extension.path.siteRelative
.. include:: /Includes.rst.txt

.. _fluidtypo3-vhs-extension-path-siterelative:

==========================================================================
extension.path.siteRelative ViewHelper `<vhs:extension.path.siteRelative>`
==========================================================================


Path: Relative Extension Folder Path
====================================

Returns the site relative path to an extension folder.


.. _fluidtypo3-vhs-extension-path-siterelative_arguments:

Arguments
=========


.. _extension.path.siterelative_extensionname:

extensionName
-------------

:aspect:`DataType`
   string

:aspect:`Required`
   false
:aspect:`Description`
   Name, in UpperCamelCase, of the extension to be checked
